item.title: An ETF That Pays Cash Weekly? An In-Depth Look at $MAGY's Pros and Cons
item.description: $MAGY is an ETF that applies a covered call strategy to the ‘Magnificent Seven,’ providing a high weekly distribution. While it offers the advantage of pursuing both growth and income, it also has clear drawbacks like extreme concentration and limited upside potential. This post provides a deep dive into how $MAGY works and its pros and cons.
